title: Ticket #1927: DNS library (resolv) needs to be linked to explicitly on Darwin
description: On Darwin (10.5+), the resolv library needs to be linked to explicitly to get daemon-core working.
remarks:
2011-Feb-24 03:34:54 by matt:
Trusting Ben wouldn't send a bad patch and somewhat blindly applying. It does not break existing builds.
attachments: • condor_daemon_core.V6-CMakeLists.txt.patch 455 bytes added by burnett on 2011-Feb-23 19:54:35 UTC.
check_ins: 2011-Feb-24 03:33   Check-in [20736]: Patch from Ben Burnett to get DC linking on OS X (10.5+), #1927 (By Matthew Farrellee )
creator: burnett
